section.p: In this section, you will transfer a volume to another HPE Helion project.

ol.li: In the Horizon Dashboard, navigate to the Volumes page, then select Create Transfer from the dropdown menu of the volume QNAP.
In the resulting dialog box. enter the transfer name “QNAP_Trans” and click Create Volume Transfer.

In the resulting Volume Transfer Details page, record the Transfer ID and Authorization Key. You will need these values to complete the transfer in a following step. Make sure to record the values while on this page, as they will not be available after the page is closed.
Click Close when you have finished recording the values.
From the dropdown menu on the Volumes page, select the qnap project.
The following image shows that the qnap project has no volumes. Click the Accept Transfer button to transfer a volume to the qnap project.
In the resulting dialog box, enter the Transfer ID and Authorization Key that you recorded from Step 3, and then click Accept Volume Transfer.
On the Volumes page, the volume QNAP should now appear in the list of volumes.
